pages.text: Charge is a type of point-type spell form, with no collision of its own, and the target of the spell is the target acquired by the previous form. $(br2)In its default state, Charging inherits the mana benefits of the previous spell form, and as the duration and force of the spell increases, it increases its own mana benefits. $(br2)When the force and duration of the spell are high enough, it can increase the mana benefits to 3-4 times or more.
